data.name: Will To Live Online - Founder's Pack
data.detailed_description:
“Founder’s Pack” is a bundle of the custom colored weapon and extra customization options that allow you to expand your visuals without affecting gameplay in any impactful way. Purchasing “Founder’s Pack” you provide us with additional support and help us to make the game better!

“Founder’s Pack” includes:

  • A warm knitted sweater with deer. Looks like grandmother knitted it.
  • Faction sweater. Prove your loyalty to the faction!
  • The Wolf-357 “Silver” revolver;
  • Combat and NV-1 knives with “Damascus” skin;
  • A set of four different glasses;
  • “Skull” and “Pattern” jeans
  • The axe. Yes, it is. Not for cutting the woods. It is a bladed weapon. Now you know what to do!

Where can I get these items in the game?


Such items, as glasses and clothes available during character creation or configuring. To get the weapon, you have to visit Black Market trader in the first town.

data.supported_languages:
English, Russian*, German, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3100 MHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 760 / AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3100 MHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD R9 390
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
